author: wtopstaff
title: Stars-Flyers Sums
text:
0 1—1 
First Period_1, Dallas, Seguin 4 (Ja.Benn, Klingberg), 19:08. Penalties_Ja.Benn, Dal (cross-checking), 1:02; Dallas bench, served by Seguin (too many men), 10:45. 
Second Period_2, Dallas, Ja.Benn 6 (Seguin, Goligoski), :11. Penalties_Roussel, Dal (interference, roughing), 4:55; Gagner, Phi (roughing), 4:55; Roussel, Dal (slashing), 12:55; White, Phi, double minor (roughing), 12:55. 
Third Period_3, Philadelphia, Couturier 1 (Simmonds, Read), 8:57. Penalties_Oduya, Dal (slashing), 5:38; Simmonds, Phi (unsportsmanlike conduct), 5:38; Spezza, Dal (hooking), 13:51; Read, Phi (slashing), 17:52. 
Shots on Goal_Dallas 14-12-6_32. Philadelphia 7-13-15_35. 
Power-play opportunities_Dallas 0 of 2; Philadelphia 0 of 4. 
Goalies_Dallas, Niemi 2-1-0 (35 shots-34 saves). Philadelphia, Mason 0-2-1 (32-30). 
A_19,077 (19,537). T_2:35. 
Referees_Eric Furlatt, Tom Kowal. Linesmen_Derek Amell, Jay Sharrers. Topics:
